author: arj
msg: Workflow.jsp receives minor UI tweaks, notably the replacement of submit buttons with a JavaScript-driven dropdown. The default.properties localization file receives properties in preparation for the new user profile workflow (not checked in yet, because it isn't debugged).

author: arj
msg: Unit tests for the page-save workflow now simulate PageFilter failures so that proper propagation of exceptions is verified. Should help Janne a lot.

author: arj
msg: Many incremental changes to the workflow package to increase ease of use. A new WorkflowBuilder class includes a factory method for composing simple approval workflows. SaveWikiPageWorkflow and the workflow.impl package goes away, and instead the workflow code for saving pages moves to inner classes in PageManager (it is now much smaller because it uses WorkflowBuilder).
